LABEL: 0x1B3
STRING: We met up in the lobby and told them that we couldn't find the buoy.

LABEL: 0x201
STRING: 「If there is one, it's in the warehouse in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x22F
STRING: 「However, <COOS> is over there...」

LABEL: 0x265
STRING: Right now, we didn't have an active countermeasure against <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x2B3
STRING: If we didn't get them out of the way somehow, we wouldn't be able to go any further.

LABEL: 0x367
STRING: 「...Sorry, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x391
STRING: 「Can I talk to you for a second?」

LABEL: 0x3CE
STRING: With that said, Yukari and Hiragino went to talk in a corner of the lobby.

LABEL: 0x408
STRING: Her expression was serious, but that didn't mean she was hiding something grave from us.

LABEL: 0x46A
STRING: I wondered what they were discussing...

LABEL: 0x565
STRING: 「Will we be okay?」

LABEL: 0x589
STRING: 「All we have to do is find a messenger buoy, right?」

LABEL: 0x5CF
STRING: 「If only we could somehow get rid of <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x61A
STRING: 「Even if we were to take them out, we can't kill them.」

LABEL: 0x652
STRING: 「What we need is a way to temporarily repel them without killing them.」

LABEL: 0x704
STRING: 「I see. Then we'll use <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x797
STRING: 「...If you don't mind us taking some from her.」

LABEL: 0x7DA
STRING: 「Of course I mind. You dumbo.」

LABEL: 0x87E
STRING: 「Tch.」

LABEL: 0x899
STRING: Reiri clicked her tongue.

LABEL: 0x8F1
STRING: However, Tokiwa had a point for once.

LABEL: 0x92B
STRING: It wasn't the end of the world,

LABEL: 0x961
STRING: but without Hikari's consent and with her sister opposed to it, we couldn't do it forcefully.

LABEL: 0x9B5
STRING: But, if <Alice> wasn't an option, what else was there...?

LABEL: 0xA67
STRING: 「Why don't we use the diving suit?」

LABEL: 0xA97
STRING: 「That should be safe, right?」

LABEL: 0xAC4
STRING: 「No... That might be a good idea, but...」

LABEL: 0xB02
STRING: 「Honestly, it's quite difficult to wear it inside, let alone underwater.」

LABEL: 0xC2C
STRING: 「Besides, we don't want the diving suit to be contaminated by <COOS> in any way.」

LABEL: 0xCE9
STRING: 「It's not exactly our last resort, but I'd like to save it...」

LABEL: 0xD95
STRING: 「Then how about the macaroni penguin?」

LABEL: 0xDCF
STRING: 「It would be cuter than a diving suit, right?」

LABEL: 0xE0A
STRING: That had nothing to do with it.

LABEL: 0xE28
STRING: However, if that unusual mascot got contaminated, it wouldn't be a huge loss to anyone.

LABEL: 0xF01
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0xF2C
STRING: 「It's a reasonable suggestion.」

LABEL: 0xF55
STRING: All right, it was decided.

LABEL: 0xF73
STRING: I thought back to the abandoned macaroni penguin costume on the floor of the warehouse earlier.

LABEL: 0xFC1
STRING: With this, I'd be able to play an active role again...!

LABEL: 0xFE9
STRING: 「Well then, let's go back to the warehouse and――」

LABEL: 0x1087
STRING: 「One moment, please.」

LABEL: 0x10AD
STRING: 「I have another idea.」

LABEL: 0x10DE
STRING: Another idea?

LABEL: 0x110B
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x118C
STRING: 「Could you help me carry something?」

LABEL: 0x14D9
STRING: A few minutes later...

LABEL: 0x14EF
STRING: I was completely exhausted, even though I wasn't wearing a diving suit.

LABEL: 0x153B
STRING: We had done as Yukari told us and went from the emergency room to the lobby.

LABEL: 0x1573
STRING: We somehow managed to pull "it" along with us.

LABEL: 0x1647
STRING: 「...Haah, haah.」

LABEL: 0x1667
STRING: It was really heavy.

LABEL: 0x1683
STRING: I mean, this wasn't something you normally carried around with you, was it?

LABEL: 0x16BD
STRING: I couldn't believe Yukari had asked to bring this with us...

LABEL: 0x16ED
STRING: 「Haah... I... can't take it anymore...」

LABEL: 0x1783
STRING: 「Are you okay, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x183C
STRING: 「All right. I'll take care of the rest.」

LABEL: 0x188B
STRING: With that, Hiragino carried the giant mechanism into the lobby by himself.

LABEL: 0x18D3
STRING: No matter how weak I was... this guy was too strong.

LABEL: 0x19DC
STRING: 「Okay, is here fine?」

LABEL: 0x1A15
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x1A37
STRING: 「Good work, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x1ABC
STRING: 「...And Katagiri-san, too.」

LABEL: 0x1AEB
STRING: Yukari chuckled.

LABEL: 0x1B11
STRING: Sorry for being so weak...

LABEL: 0x1B31
STRING: Since Hiragino and I were the only male members, we were left with all the heavy lifting.

LABEL: 0x1B7D
STRING: I wasn't a physically active person to begin with.

LABEL: 0x1BAD
STRING: Taking that into consideration, I was doing great, wasn't I?

LABEL: 0x1C3E
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x1C5F
STRING: Reiri grinned as she saw the equipment being brought in.

LABEL: 0x1C99
STRING: She looked to know what it was, but Touri beside her didn't seem to understand at all.

LABEL: 0x1CF7
STRING: I didn't know what it was, either.

LABEL: 0x1D37
STRING: 「...So, what is this thing?」

LABEL: 0x1D5F
STRING: It was a cylindrical device of some sort.

LABEL: 0x1D79
STRING: The cylinder must've been about fifty centimeters in radius.

LABEL: 0x1DAB
STRING: It was similar to a washing machine, but calling it that was incorrect.

LABEL: 0x1DFB
STRING: Judging by the fact that it was placed in the emergency room, it had to be a medical device of some sort...

LABEL: 0x1EB3
STRING: 「Hm, right.」

LABEL: 0x1ED7
STRING: 「Let's do a little experiment first.」

LABEL: 0x1F68
STRING: 「...It's a bit dangerous, so could you all please step back?」

LABEL: 0x1FCB
STRING: Yukari herded us away.

LABEL: 0x2001
STRING: We surrounded the device placed near the center of the lobby at a safe distance.

LABEL: 0x204B
STRING: This looked like we were performing some kind of a ritual.

LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: 「Now then... Hiragino-sensei, could you turn it on, please?」

LABEL: 0x20CD
STRING: 「...Sure.」

LABEL: 0x20EC
STRING: Hiragino removed the cross from his neck and handed it to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2192
STRING: 「Hold on to it for me.」

LABEL: 0x21D3
STRING: Just what was going on?

LABEL: 0x21F7
STRING: I couldn't believe he would relinquish the cross he'd been wearing all this time so easily.

LABEL: 0x224F
STRING: Did he need to prepare for something...?

LABEL: 0x2299
STRING: Hiragino then walked up to the device and――

LABEL: 0x2333
STRING: ――Turned it on.

LABEL: 0x2359
STRING: There was a low, thundering roar.

LABEL: 0x2379
STRING: Nothing looked any different, but it felt like something was happening.

LABEL: 0x23CB
STRING: Yukari called out to Tokiwa without explaining.

LABEL: 0x2426
STRING: 「...Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x2446
STRING: 「How is it?」

LABEL: 0x2535
STRING: Tokiwa's eyes widened as Yukari called out to her, and she stared intently at the device.

LABEL: 0x2583
STRING: Nothing seemed to have changed from before turning it on,

LABEL: 0x25CB
STRING: so what was she so drawn to?

LABEL: 0x2603
STRING: Yukari asked her again.

LABEL: 0x26F6
STRING: 「Can you see anything?」

LABEL: 0x2724
STRING: 「What kind of colors do you see...?」

LABEL: 0x275F
STRING: 「Colors...?」

LABEL: 0x27A4
STRING: 「...It's colorful, like a violent storm.」

LABEL: 0x27D8
STRING: 「A flood of colors.」

LABEL: 0x27FD
STRING: You're kidding...

LABEL: 0x2817
STRING: How could a bland, unremarkable piece of equipment like that look so colorful?

LABEL: 0x2881
STRING: As with the keycard and <COOS>, were you telling me this was something only Tokiwa could see?

LABEL: 0x293D
STRING: 「Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x2963
STRING: 「It's as I suspected.」

LABEL: 0x29A2
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x29C7
STRING: Hiragino nodded in agreement.

LABEL: 0x29EF
STRING: ...Argh, I didn't have a clue what was going on.

LABEL: 0x2A57
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, what the hell is this――」

LABEL: 0x2A98
STRING: 「Watch out!」

LABEL: 0x2AD1
STRING: The moment I took a step toward the device...

LABEL: 0x2AFD
STRING: My pocket started shaking.

LABEL: 0x2B1D
STRING: My pendant flew out of my pocket as if pulled by something.

LABEL: 0x2B55
STRING: There was a clanging sound.

LABEL: 0x2C17
STRING: It was the sound of the pendant I had tucked away

LABEL: 0x2C35
STRING: in my pocket sticking itself to the device.

LABEL: 0x2C9C
STRING: 「Hey now...」

LABEL: 0x2CBF
STRING: Hiragino turned the device off in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x2CE9
STRING: Eventually, as the swirling roar subsided, there was a sound of the pendant falling into the device.

LABEL: 0x2D5A
STRING: 「Phew... That was close.」

LABEL: 0x2DF6
STRING: 「I told you to stay away!」

LABEL: 0x2E29
STRING: 「S-Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x2E5A
STRING: 「If you're not careful, someone could die!」

LABEL: 0x2E8D
STRING: All I could do was earnestly apologize to Yukari, who was angry at me with a terrifying look on her face.

LABEL: 0x2EC7
STRING: But how about not doing something dangerous like this where people could die in the first place...?

LABEL: 0x2FEA
STRING: 「Now, now. There's no need to shout.」

LABEL: 0x301E
STRING: 「He's safe, so what's the big deal?」

LABEL: 0x308D
STRING: Hiragino was rummaging through the device as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x30BF
STRING: He pulled his hand out with my pendant in it.

LABEL: 0x311A
STRING: 「Hm...? This... isn't good...」

LABEL: 0x3151
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0x316F
STRING: I accepted the pendant from him.

LABEL: 0x31A9
STRING: Hiragino looked away in embarrassment.

LABEL: 0x31D5
STRING: Wondering what was wrong, I looked down at the pendant and saw that the coin had warped.

LABEL: 0x3293
STRING: 「I see the clasps were steel...」

LABEL: 0x3322
STRING: 「Sorry. I should've been more careful.」

LABEL: 0x3369
STRING: 「...Don't worry about it.」

LABEL: 0x340A
STRING: ――Anyhow.

LABEL: 0x3424
STRING: It was a gift with no receiver.

LABEL: 0x3450
STRING: And yet, it was a lump of regret I had been carrying with me all this time.

LABEL: 0x3496
STRING: A warped engraved coin.

LABEL: 0x34C4
STRING: Perhaps that was a warning that I shouldn't remain stuck in the past forever.

LABEL: 0x35C0
STRING: I put the coin back into my pocket carelessly.

LABEL: 0x3657
STRING: 「More importantly, what's this all about?」

LABEL: 0x36FB
STRING: 「Ah... This is a portable MRI device.」

LABEL: 0x3731
STRING: 「MRI?」

LABEL: 0x3748
STRING: 「Why would my pendant stick to an MRI...?」

LABEL: 0x3788
STRING: 「Why, you ask?」

LABEL: 0x37AE
STRING: 「Don't you think you've flaunted your ignorance enough already?」

LABEL: 0x37FD
STRING: Reiri laughed dryly.

LABEL: 0x38EC
STRING: 「MRI stands for "magnetic resonance imaging."」

LABEL: 0x3923
STRING: 「The point is, it's an incredibly powerful magnet.」

LABEL: 0x3945
STRING: 「It's a device by which you can learn how a nucleus behaves

LABEL: 0x3983
STRING: by placing matter inside a powerful magnetic field.」

LABEL: 0x39EE
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0x3A0A
STRING: That wasn't something I knew.

LABEL: 0x3A38
STRING: So that's why the steel of my pendant was drawn to it.

LABEL: 0x3AB0
STRING: But what were we going to do with such a device?

LABEL: 0x3BBB
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x3BD7
STRING: 「How about now? Can you see anything?」

LABEL: 0x3C18
STRING: 「No, nothing.」

LABEL: 0x3C39
STRING: Tokiwa shook her head at Yukari's question.

LABEL: 0x3C6F
STRING: Only when the MRI was on could she see those brilliant colors――

LABEL: 0x3CC4
STRING: With that, Yukari's theory turned into certainty.

LABEL: 0x3D0D
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san――」

LABEL: 0x3DB7
STRING: 「You can see magnetic fields, can't you?」

LABEL: 0x417B
STRING: Magnetic fields――

LABEL: 0x4191
STRING: The force produced by magnetism or current, and the space in which it acted.

LABEL: 0x41CD
STRING: It was a fairly common concept in high school physics, or as a diagram of concentric circles around a rod magnet,

LABEL: 0x4237
STRING: but to be able to see that magnetic field―that kind of psychic ability was unrealistic.

LABEL: 0x427B
STRING: Yukari was saying something outrageous.

LABEL: 0x42A5
STRING: However, her expression was very serious.

LABEL: 0x42D1
STRING: And... Tokiwa didn't deny it.

LABEL: 0x4309
STRING: Her eyes widened as if she had suddenly realized something, and she sank into thought.

LABEL: 0x43BD
STRING: 「I see... Now that you mention it...」

LABEL: 0x43E9
STRING: 「That shapeless, vaguely spreading color... That's a magnetic field, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x443C
STRING: 「Hey... Is that really possible?」

LABEL: 0x447A
STRING: 「This is the first time I've heard of anyone who could see magnetic fields.」

LABEL: 0x451C
STRING: 「Yes. This is also the first time I've heard of such a possibility.」

LABEL: 0x4574
STRING: 「But now that I realize it, it makes sense.」

LABEL: 0x45AC
STRING: 「This thing that I see―that only my eyes can see―must be a magnetic field.」

LABEL: 0x4619
STRING: Her suspicion turned into a hypothesis, and that hypothesis turned into conviction.

LABEL: 0x4649
STRING: Common sense would say it was impossible.

LABEL: 0x4675
STRING: However, Tokiwa, who was not bound by common sense and could only look straight at reality, had come to a conclusion.

LABEL: 0x46D5
STRING: It was surely something close to the truth.

LABEL: 0x47D2
STRING: 「I knew it...」

LABEL: 0x47EE
STRING: 「That's why Tokiwa-san was able to see <COOS> even when it wasn't emitting light.」

LABEL: 0x4853
STRING: 「Right, <COOS> has magnetosomes――」

LABEL: 0x489E
STRING: 「Correct. They have "magnets" inside them.」

LABEL: 0x48E2
STRING: 「You can see that magnetic field as "colors," right?」

LABEL: 0x492D
STRING: Even if <COOS> wasn't emitting its unique light, Tokiwa could sense its presence.

LABEL: 0x4985
STRING: When she said she could "see" it, I never thought she was actually seeing <COOS>...

LABEL: 0x4A17
STRING: 「But... if you think about it that way, it does make sense.」

LABEL: 0x4A53
STRING: 「How is it possible to see magnetic fields?」

LABEL: 0x4A93
STRING: 「And why only me?」

LABEL: 0x4ACD
STRING: I stared into Tokiwa's eyes.

LABEL: 0x4AF3
STRING: Her vivid, unclouded eyes were like those of a child's.

LABEL: 0x4B37
STRING: But no matter how beautiful her eyes were, there was nothing more special about them―it didn't look like they had any kind of special color or shape.

LABEL: 0x4BB1
STRING: Yukari grabbed her elbow and thought carefully.

LABEL: 0x4C53
STRING: 「...Being able to see magnetic fields isn't a special ability in nature.」

LABEL: 0x4CAD
STRING: 「Migratory birds, for example, know their direction by looking at the geomagnetic field.」

LABEL: 0x4CF7
STRING: 「Special visual cells in the bird's eyes, which contain a certain protein, can detect the magnetic field.」

LABEL: 0x4D5F
STRING: 「That protein is called――」

LABEL: 0x4D94
STRING: 「――Cryptochrome.」

LABEL: 0x4E26
STRING: 「...You know your stuff.」

LABEL: 0x4E4F
STRING: Reiri whispered to Yukari, interrupting her.

LABEL: 0x4E97
STRING: She walked over to Tokiwa slowly, who was on the opposite side of the lobby.

LABEL: 0x4F43
STRING: 「Cryptochromes don't only affect circadian rhythms.」

LABEL: 0x4F87
STRING: 「They can also detect magnetic fields―it's been known for a long time.」

LABEL: 0x5022
STRING: 「――Doctor. You know a lot about human bodies, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x506B
STRING: She was walking leisurely.

LABEL: 0x5089
STRING: Reiri, who had somehow managed to take control of the situation, glanced at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x5198
STRING: 「...Of course. Cryptochromes exist in the human eye.」

LABEL: 0x51DA
STRING: 「However, they're only used to regulate circadian rhythms.」

LABEL: 0x522F
STRING: 「Yes, "they're only used to regulate circadian rhythms."」

LABEL: 0x5273
STRING: 「Just because it's not being used... doesn't mean that the ability to detect magnetic fields isn't there.」

LABEL: 0x52FF
STRING: 「There was an experiment.」

LABEL: 0x5321
STRING: 「When human-derived cryptochromes were implanted in fruit flies that had previously lost their magnetic sensor,

LABEL: 0x5391
STRING: the flies were able to sense magnetism again.」

LABEL: 0x53DB
STRING: 「In other words... human cryptochromes can detect magnetic fields.」

LABEL: 0x5426
STRING: We should be able to, but we didn't.

LABEL: 0x5454
STRING: That said, it wouldn't be something that could be done through effort.

LABEL: 0x549A
STRING: And that didn't explain why Tokiwa, and only her, could sense and see magnetic fields.

LABEL: 0x5543
STRING: 「...I have a theory.」

LABEL: 0x556E
STRING: Hiragino folded his arms.

LABEL: 0x558E
STRING: She glanced at Tokiwa with a difficult expression.

LABEL: 0x55BE
STRING: As for Tokiwa, she didn't seem to notice his gaze, even though everyone around her was talking about her.

LABEL: 0x5608
STRING: Finally, she caught his stare and tilted her head quizzically.

LABEL: 0x573B
STRING: 「Just consider this as a theory and listen...」

LABEL: 0x57CE
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun... You were once infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x5812
STRING: 「And in order to restore your clock genes, including cryptochromes,

LABEL: 0x5864
STRING: gene therapy was conducted on you using retrovirus vectors.」

LABEL: 0x58AB
STRING: If <Alice> developed, you'd have to undergo gene therapy...

LABEL: 0x58F1
STRING: That could improve the symptoms.

LABEL: 0x59A9
STRING: 「Your cryptochromes were destroyed in the past by <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x59F7
STRING: 「Then, through gene therapy, those cryptochromes were restored in your eyes.」

LABEL: 0x5A49
STRING: 「And these... "acquired" cryptochromes connected in a different way

LABEL: 0x5AA1
STRING: to your biological circuits.」

LABEL: 0x5AD3
STRING: 「As a result, you can see magnetic fields.」

LABEL: 0x5B16
STRING: <Alice> infection.

LABEL: 0x5B38
STRING: Lost cryptochromes.

LABEL: 0x5B5E
STRING: Gene therapy.

LABEL: 0x5B78
STRING: Super-vision that was able to capture magnetic fields.

LABEL: 0x5B9C
STRING: ...If Hiragino was right, it all connected.

LABEL: 0x5BD0
STRING: But if Tokiwa had been infected with <Alice>,

LABEL: 0x5C14
STRING: that would mean that――

LABEL: 0x5C49
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x5CED
STRING: 「You... were asleep for seven years, weren't you?」

LABEL: 0x5D57
STRING: Tokiwa's eyes and mouth were wide open.

LABEL: 0x5D83
STRING: She took a small step back, unable to hide her shock. She opened and closed her mouth while trying to say something, and eventually spoke in a trembling voice.

LABEL: 0x5DFC
STRING: 「...Please, tell me.」

LABEL: 0x5E1E
STRING: 「...What year is it?」

LABEL: 0x5F1D
STRING: Tokiwa's eyes opened even wider.

LABEL: 0x5F55
STRING: Her reaction told me everything.

LABEL: 0x5F83
STRING: Just as Hiragino said, Tokiwa had been asleep for the past seven years.

LABEL: 0x5FC9
STRING: This might not be the right way to put it, but...

LABEL: 0x5FF5
STRING: ...I had vaguely expected this.

LABEL: 0x601D
STRING: I had first noticed something was strange when she couldn't use a keyboard.

LABEL: 0x60E3
STRING: Despite her extremely smooth keystrokes, she was unable to type on a standard keyboard.

LABEL: 0x614B
STRING: She didn't know about the DVORAK layout, to be precise.

LABEL: 0x6183
STRING: Programming was made compulsory nationwide in 2028,

LABEL: 0x61C1
STRING: and our government took the initiative to change the standard keyboard layout from QWERTY to DVORAK at the same time.

LABEL: 0x6225
STRING: They were criticized by programmers in every possible field, but the changes were nonetheless forced through.

LABEL: 0x627F
STRING: Most of the keyboards in public institutions were now using a DVORAK layout,

LABEL: 0x62C9
STRING: which meant that people who used PCs in their daily work, like me, had to relearn.

LABEL: 0x632F
STRING: It was a confusing and troublesome period...

LABEL: 0x63DD
STRING: ...But that was five years ago.

LABEL: 0x640C
STRING: After a brief period of confusion, society quickly adapted to the DVORAK layout.

LABEL: 0x6466
STRING: Keyboards with QWERTY layout were now increasingly rare, even if it was only five years ago.

LABEL: 0x64B9
STRING: Tokiwa, however, did not know about that.

LABEL: 0x64ED
STRING: And the biggest thing...

LABEL: 0x6513
STRING: ...Was the fact that she didn't know about the "Fourth Day." About the disappearance of Betelgeuse.

LABEL: 0x6601
STRING: The true nature of the "Fourth Day" was Betelgeuse's supernova explosion.

LABEL: 0x6641
STRING: The star that formed the corner of Orion didn't exist anymore.

LABEL: 0x6685
STRING: Still, Tokiwa hadn't known that.

LABEL: 0x66B7
STRING: It was already abnormal that she wouldn't know about the tragic nature of the accident that day,

LABEL: 0x6705
STRING: but that was still explainable if she had been shut off from the outside world.

LABEL: 0x67C7
STRING: However, she had been surprised that Betelgeuse was not present in the constellation of Orion in the theater room planetarium. She didn't know.

LABEL: 0x682B
STRING: She didn't know about the disappearance of Betelgeuse.

LABEL: 0x685F
STRING: That defied common sense.

LABEL: 0x68EB
STRING: Even if she had been confined in a facility while doing research,

LABEL: 0x691D
STRING: there was no way she could have remained in the dark about it.

LABEL: 0x698F
STRING: It made sense that she would suddenly look sleepy

LABEL: 0x69DD
STRING: regardless of how excited she'd been up to that point if it was some kind of an aftereffect.

LABEL: 0x6A11
STRING: She, like Hikari, was an <Alice>-carrier.

LABEL: 0x6B54
STRING: 「...I can't remember.」

LABEL: 0x6B7C
STRING: 「I was... looking after Rumi-chan after she collapsed on the shore.」

LABEL: 0x6BC4
STRING: 「Waking up in a body like this...」

LABEL: 0x6BF8
STRING: 「But... it was <Alice>, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x6C2C
STRING: 「That's why I've been able to see strange things since waking up.」

LABEL: 0x6CE1
STRING: 「So, I'm special... that makes sense.」

LABEL: 0x6D0A
STRING: ...No, no, no.

LABEL: 0x6D2A
STRING: It was seven years, right?

LABEL: 0x6D44
STRING: It wasn't seven years of an elderly person, either.

LABEL: 0x6D6E
STRING: It was seven years of a teenage girl.

LABEL: 0x6D8E
STRING: Your body would grow and weaken as you slept.

LABEL: 0x6DCA
STRING: Once you woke up, you'd realize that you were now taller and your body was grown up...

LABEL: 0x6E22
STRING: It didn't make sense.

LABEL: 0x6E54
STRING: I mean, wouldn't you normally think it was strange?

LABEL: 0x6E95
STRING: 「I didn't really question it because I thought that's just the way it was.」

LABEL: 0x6F42
STRING: 「――I remember my father saying that I'd "opened Urashima's casket."」

LABEL: 0x6F8F
STRING: 「Urashima...」

LABEL: 0x7017
STRING: 「He isn't the kind of man to lie.」

LABEL: 0x7051
STRING: 「He was the one who always taught me not to doubt others.」

LABEL: 0x70B6
STRING: This was absurd――

LABEL: 0x70D2
STRING: Could a fairy tale like that be real?

LABEL: 0x70FC
STRING: However, Tokiwa didn't seem to be lying.

LABEL: 0x713A
STRING: She spoke with the same honest eyes as always.

LABEL: 0x716C
STRING: That was right, her clear eyes――

LABEL: 0x7196
STRING: If she had spent most of those seven years sleeping...

LABEL: 0x71DE
STRING: She wouldn't have "changed" since she was in middle school...

LABEL: 0x7288
STRING: A middle school student who disappeared seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x72B0
STRING: She was here again, exactly like she was back then.

LABEL: 0x72F6
STRING: Was she this smart all the way back then...?

LABEL: 0x7322
STRING: It was frightening.

LABEL: 0x7344
STRING: I didn't want to throw around the word genius willy-nilly, but it was already self-evident that she couldn't be measured in the same way as normal people.

LABEL: 0x749A
STRING: She was, in the truest sense of the word, a genius.

LABEL: 0x74C6
STRING: No, that was... fantastical.

LABEL: 0x74EC
STRING: She wasn't created by <COOS>,

LABEL: 0x751E
STRING: and despite being sealed away by <Alice> for seven years,

LABEL: 0x755E
STRING: she was still a girl with brains no ordinary person could match.

LABEL: 0x7598
STRING: I had tried to comfort her earlier, but I now realized it wasn't something I could handle.

LABEL: 0x7600
STRING: It made sense that the people around her treated her like a god.

LABEL: 0x763E
STRING: Shock, awe, sympathy, and pity.

LABEL: 0x76A2
STRING: She stood alone at the center of it all and took on all those mixed emotions by herself.

LABEL: 0x76FF
STRING: 「So... that's why this <SHEEP> is the third.」

LABEL: 0x7739
STRING: 「Yes, I was originally told it was simply <SHEEP>.」

LABEL: 0x777A
STRING: 「I should've realized it then.」

LABEL: 0x77B1
STRING: 「What... do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x7845
STRING: 「I learned about the existence of a ship called <SHEEP>.」

LABEL: 0x7890
STRING: 「Well, I really wanted to see the deep sea, so...」

LABEL: 0x78CC
STRING: 「I was promised I could ride it one day.」

LABEL: 0x7910
STRING: 「And while I was spending my time wondering when that would be, I lost consciousness...」

LABEL: 0x7971
STRING: Just like that, she slept for seven years...

LABEL: 0x79B0
STRING: 「After I woke up, I was told that the departure of the <SHEEP> had been postponed.」

LABEL: 0x79F7
STRING: 「Then, after a while, I was told something else.」

LABEL: 0x7A35
STRING: 「That the <SHEEP> was about to set sail. The arrangements had changed a bit, but as long as I was feeling fine, I could come aboard.」

LABEL: 0x7AA1
STRING: While she slept, what had been <SHEEP> had morphed into <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x7B67
STRING: 「When I boarded the ship, I was surprised to find that it was several dozen times larger than I had heard.」

LABEL: 0x7BCB
STRING: 「I thought it would only be a three-person ship, but it was much bigger than I expected.」

LABEL: 0x7C20
STRING: 「The windows were huge, and I could see the fish right up close.」

LABEL: 0x7CBF
STRING: 「My, was I uncharacteristically excited. I just had to enjoy myself.」

LABEL: 0x7D07
STRING: 「But... I see. So this is the <SHEEP's> grandchild... A different <SHEEP>.」

LABEL: 0x7D6C
STRING: Tokiwa nodded repeatedly.

LABEL: 0x7D8E
STRING: So did that mean it was only by chance that she got on this ship?

LABEL: 0x7DD8
STRING: Because she happened to fall asleep, and happened to wake up――

LABEL: 0x7E1A
STRING: And, because she happened to survive the first accident, Tokiwa was here now.

LABEL: 0x7E88
STRING: ...I couldn't help but think if she wasn't here.

LABEL: 0x7ECE
STRING: And not just Tokiwa, everyone present.

LABEL: 0x7F12
STRING: How would things have changed if someone else had been here in their stead?

LABEL: 0x7F64
STRING: I couldn't even begin to guess.

LABEL: 0x7F82
STRING: Because that hadn't actually happened, I could imagine any number of good and bad scenarios.

LABEL: 0x7FEE
STRING: However, there was no point in worrying about those possibilities.

LABEL: 0x802C
STRING: None of those things had come to pass.

LABEL: 0x8088
STRING: Before we could worry about the futures that weren't chosen for us,

LABEL: 0x80BC
STRING: we had some work to do.

LABEL: 0x81B9
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x8241
STRING: 「Yes, this is Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x82CF
STRING: 「――Thank you. You've helped me see the light.」

LABEL: 0x831B
STRING: 「With this, <COOS> will no longer be a threat.」

LABEL: 0x834F
STRING: 「Now, let's go, everyone...」

LABEL: 0x83B3
STRING: 「――Let's retrieve the messenger buoy.」
